name: Internship Apps
description: Several primary insurance small UI5 applications. All of them had SAP Gateway backend services, which exposed RFCs from standard modules. Most of the applications targeted the transport insurance segment and two of them targeted small goods primary insurance.

images.description: Using the bill creation application, the user can add several items to a new bill.
Then the user must either search for the customer (business partner) or create a new one.
At the end, the user must agree to the terms and conditions. A PDF receipt is created afterwards.
